verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* prayed \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w*’s \w belly|strong="H4578"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3068"\w* called \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* affliction \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* answered me. Out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w belly|strong="H4578"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol\f + \fr 2:2 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* cried. \w You|strong="H6419"\w* heard \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H6963"\w* threw \w me|strong="H6963"\w* into \w the|strong="H8085"\w* depths, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* seas. \w The|strong="H8085"\w* flood \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H7121"\w* around \w me|strong="H6963"\w*. \w All|strong="H7121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* waves \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* billows \w passed|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* said, ‘\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5104"\w* \w been|strong="H5674"\w* banished \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* sight; \w yet|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3824"\w* look \w again|strong="H5674"\w* towards \w your|strong="H3605"\w* holy temple.’

\w The|strong="H3254"\w* waters surrounded \w me|strong="H5048"\w*, \w even|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3254"\w* soul. \w The|strong="H3254"\w* deep was around \w me|strong="H5048"\w*. \w The|strong="H3254"\w* weeds \w were|strong="H5869"\w* wrapped around \w my|strong="H5048"\w* head.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w went|strong="H5437"\w* \w down|strong="H5437"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* bottoms \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* mountains. \w The|strong="H5704"\w* earth barred \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w forever|strong="H5704"\w*; \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H8415"\w* \w brought|strong="H5437"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w up|strong="H2280"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* pit, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* God.

“\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul fainted \w within|strong="H1157"\w* \w me|strong="H1157"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* remembered \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w you|strong="H3381"\w*, \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* holy temple.
\w Those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w regard|strong="H5921"\w* vain idols forsake \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5800"\w* I \w will|strong="H2617"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w you|strong="H5800"\w* with \w the|strong="H8104"\w* voice \w of|strong="H2617"\w* thanksgiving. I \w will|strong="H2617"\w* \w pay|strong="H8104"\w* \w that|strong="H7723"\w* \w which|strong="H2617"\w* I \w have|strong="H5800"\w* vowed. Salvation belongs \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* spoke \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fish, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7999"\w* vomited out Jonah \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dry land.
